attributes.additional_details:
The Central Line to be Extended at West Ruislip to serve Ickenham, Hillingdon & Uxbridge.

This would provide an alternative to the Metropolitan Line when affected by frequent signalling problems.

Provide a direct lnk to people living in Northolt, Ruislip Gardens & South Ruislip to Uxbridge for Shopping Centres, Civic Centre & L B Hillingdon's main transport Hub

Would also connect Uxbridge with the West End & the City,,
as well as Stratford & HS 1 & Eurotunnel services

This would be a Value for money project. as track is already in place . for use of Pernament Way maintainence trains.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Mayor and Greater London Assembly.
